Bioinformatics utilities: {VERSION}

Usage: bio COMMAND

Data commands

    {{ "%-10s" | format(VIEW) }}  - obtains and/or converts biological data

Action commands

    {{ "%-10s" | format(ALIGN) }} - aligns sequences with different algorithms

Get more help on each command with:

    bio COMMAND -h

Examples:

    bio view AF086833 > data.gb
